featured.text: Perhaps there is an inadequate or illegible address and there is no return address.
The speaker was Robot Redford, a robot who delivered the commencement address at a community college in suburban Maryland.
Despite his busy schedule, the President ______ the school’s graduation ceremony with his presence and a heartwarming speech. (A) praised (B) graced (C) addressed (D) credited 10.
It was not until Grover Cleveland’s first presidency that some effective crowd control measures were implemented to address the problem caused by this practice.

definition.zh_def: 地址；演講；處理（問題或情況）
definition.en_def: A location where someone lives or an organization is situated; to speak to a group or to deal with a matter.
definition.example: Please send the package to my new address.
